features: CAR FRESHENERS: Drift car air fresheners are made to uproot your typical air freshener. We've combined sophisticated, functional design with real, designer and luxury grade scents. This set includes a metal clip to attach to your car visor.

BEST NATURAL FRESHENERS: This natural car air freshener is designed to keep your ride fresh. Our Grove scent is full of fresh mountain greens, crisp citrus and good vibes. Made of an organic stone blend specifically formulated for strong, even scent distribution all month long.
LONG LASTING: Crafted with our drift natural essential and fragrance oil blends to deliver a great scent free of harmful chemicals all day. Looks good, smells good, all good.
REFILLABLE SCENTS: Keep scent sealed in bag and out of the sun until ready for use. Replace the scent block at minimum every 30 days. Metal visor clip not included in refill pack.

SIMPLE DESIGN: Attach your Drift metal clip to visor so the ledge faces down when closed. Open one side of bag until scent dissipates and freshener doesn't have any visible oil on surface. Attach the scent block to the clip, it will magnetically snap in, make sure there is no overhang on either side of the clip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SIMPLY THE BEST!
reviews.reviewText: First of all, it smells like a decent perfume!!! Such a pleasant smell, I really love it and would use such a cologne lol. Secondly, it looks and feels chic! Especially if compared to cheap looking hanging "trees" etc. One downside for me is that I wish the fragrance was more intense

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teak scent = spice gumdrop
reviews.reviewText: Love the teak scent, but no clue what part of it translates to traditional 'teak' wood to be named as such. This smells exactly like a spiced flavor gumdrop.. depending on the brand it would either be the white or red (non-cinnamon) gumdrop... Think sweet clove, maybe hints of nutmeg, but subtle and classy. This is definitely NOT a nasty cinnamon/spice kitchen candle scent, so don't let the 'spice' term mislead or deter you. I just wish it came in the 3 pack refills!I left it in it's original package with the just the end cut off and stuck it right on the visor clip, the scent lasts easily over a month and I don't have to worry about it accidentally sliding over and being in direct contact with my visor or accidentally putting my hand on it when I flip the visor up/down. BONUS, since it's magnetic, I also stuck the stone (still in packaging with one end open) directly on a metal AC vent cover in my house and it made the room smell great for weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars melted sun visor:good company.
reviews.reviewText: The oils reacted with the fabric on my sun visor and melted it. Scent was good.EDIT: I'm changing my review because Drift remediated my issue by offering to buy me a replacement part for the visor.Their customer service is fantastic. I received fast communication and wonderful service.I definitely recommend Drift to others, just be careful and watch out for the oils leaking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The stone I received didn’t have any Drift logo on it. The black holder was scratched and dented. Overall, it seemed very cheaply made.Fragrance - VERY potent so I would say, it works well. The black holder would definitely make a permanent impression in your visor if it’s thicker.Instead of using it in my car, I put it in our guest closet because it’s way too strong for the car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My car smells amazing
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect alternative to those sprays and plug-ins to your air vents long lasting smell easy to install and light enough sent that it’s not overpowered smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was very excited for this product, because so many reviews mentioned how strong the scent was but I don’t know if I got a defective stone. The scent is so minimal. I can only smell it when I hold the stone under my nose. When I get in the car, there’s not an aroma of scent. The traditional hanging car fresheners are much stronger than this.I do really enjoy the sleek look of it, though, so reading two stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: really glad I purchased it…love the smell..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Scent is weak
reviews.reviewText: The product is awesome and I have one for each car. The stone scents however are not as strong and don't last as long as the wooden ones. I'd highly recommend getting the wooden air fresheners just for that reason even if the stone ones look nicer.
